text: Will review carefully once I'm back at a computer.

<@U0HPGQ4KH> I think these are great.  Way to go.  A few comments and questions; let’s address here for pruposes of larity and visibility. I can hop on a call if you’d like.  

General comment: do you think there are enough bathrooms?  We’e talking about 40+ people on the 3rd floor, 10+ on first and second so ant any given time more than 60 people and three total toilets.  Feels low to me.  And we’d have issues when we host events.  *Is there a way to put stalls in the current bathroom footprint*?  Sorry if that’s the intention and I’m misreading…

General comment: Let’s assume glass walls to the conference rooms - I like this.  

General comment: I love all the storage options.  *Do you have examples of storage solutions you have in mind for this or you just portioning the space for them?*

Desk shares:  *are you still thinking we can squeeze in any biz seats on 2nd floor or too forced?*
- *What is the state of 2nd floor is it int he same place it was last week or are you currently working on that?*

*Finally, for 3rd Floor, what if any compromises and shortcomings do you see in 3b  I like 3b…*

<@U0HPGQ4KH|felix> uploaded a file: <https://uncorked.slack.com/files/felix/F2U2HMQFJ/25th_oct_2016_-_peemmmmcee_notes.rtf|25th Oct 2016 - PeeMmMmCee notes.rtf> and commented: Hey Dennis: I answered in a simple text doc: this channel has already a lot of words :slightly_smiling_face:

initial_comment.comment: Hey Dennis: I answered in a simple text doc: this channel has already a lot of words :slightly_smiling_face:

text: interesting idea.  i’ll take a look now, thanks

TL;DR
that as very helpful.  nice work <@U0HPGQ4KH> 

- let’s represent two toilets in each floor.  
- let’s call it glass on the meeting rooms for now, til we get an architect involved.  Remember what ZGF did?  See what we did in Echo?  We can always block vision somehow later on down the line.
- include notes on storage hight in your next doc
- when you work on floor 1 and 2 next, do you think it’d be good to have an area to do spray painting and/or photo shoots (like we saw at ZGF)

Yep will do (storage height) and yes to spray painting and photo shoots. The shoots are also cool since the space could be converted quickly and the shoots are not only for finals but for work in progress.
are you unblocked from taking further steps felix or need anything else (besides time)?
time is necessary, but i think i do stuff that does not necessarily tie too much into the machines themselves, but thinking about making the space work … will give ya a shout if i need more info.
@ josh, doing a perimeter around big and midsize machines would be great. Do you want a DXF or just scribble on the PNG plans.
<@U02F8LF2X> see above about a perimeter. Remember all the jpgs are on the Drive, here: <https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B2hvp3pmOYCFeEIzZGl4OEZvUU0>
